text: is a professional Go player. ==Biography== Susumu became a professional in 1965. He was promoted to 9 dan in 1994.GoBase.org profile Susumu became a student of Kaoru Iwamoto in 1959. Reached 500 career wins in 1990. Older brother of Masaaki Fukui 8 dan.Nihon Ki-in profile ==Promotion record== ==References== ==External links== * Nihon Ki-in profile Category:1947 births Category:Japanese Go players Category:Living people Category:People from Tokyo
title: Susumu Fukui
